frameDefinitions: An Experiencer has an emotion as caused by a Stimulus or concerning a Topic.
A Location is filled or covered with the Theme.
A Total has a Part, either  as a member of an aggregate or as  a constituent part of a simple entity.
An Evaluee, which can be a person or an object, has an amount of acceptability or utilization based on general (often non-aesthetic) desirability.
A Container  is in a state of fullness/emptiness with respect to some Contents.
The Quantity of a Collection occurring in a Place has a particular Measure, which is related to the amount generally needed.
frameExamples: I fall asleep hours later to the sound of their <t>engrossed</t> murmuring.
The waters of the bay <t>teemed</t> with fish.
John carried a bucket <t>full</t> of water.
There is evidence that volatile materials have always been <t>scarce</t> on the Moon .
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person or sentient entity that experiences or feels the emotions.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the general area in which the emotion occurs.  It indicates a range of possible <fen>Stimulus</fen>.
The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the person, event, or state of affairs that evokes the emotional response in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The <fen>State</fen> is the abstract noun that describes a more lasting experience by the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.

The body part, gesture, or other expression of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> that reflects his or her emotional state.  They describe a presentation of the experience or emotion denoted by the adjective or noun.
The Time when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is has a feeling about the <fen>Stimulus</fen>.
The <fen>Theme</fen> covers or fills the <fen>Location</fen>.  This role most frequently occurs in a PP Complement headed by with or in.
<fen>Location</fen> is the object or area that the <fen>Theme</fen> fills or covers.  This frame element generally occurs as the External Argument.
The period of time during which the the Abounding_with event occurs.
A complex entity, either an aggregate or a unit, of which a <fen>Part</fen>,  a constituent or a component, is specified.
A component or constituent that is specified to form part of the <fen>Total</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Total</fen> includes the <fen>Part</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Total</fen> includes the <fen>Part</fen>.
The person or object that is being evaluated for its desirability.
The time when the Evaluee is judged to be desirable.
The geographic area where an <fen>Evaluee</fen> is considered desirable.
<fen>Container</fen> is used for the entity whose fullness is being described.
<fen>Contents</fen> is used for the stuff that is present/absent in the <fen>Container</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Container</fen> is full.
The <fen>Collection</fen> whose <fen>Quantity</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Collection</fen> which is under discussion. This role is incorporated by all the lexical units in this frame.
The location in which the <fen>Collection</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Collection</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The waters of the bay teemed <fex>with fish</fex>.
<fex>The walls</fex> crawled with nanite surveillance probes.
The larger album includes <fex>designs for his house at Whitehall</fex>.
<fex>Last year</fex> the recognized departments included the Russian and East European Institute, and the Office of International Programs.
<fex>In California</fex>, the category excludes minors and the mentally ill.
Electronica is all the rage <fex>in Europe</fex>.
The majority of specimens were poorly represented, as judged by the small size of mature plants, the immaturity of thalli or scarceness <fex>in occurrence</fex>.
Northern Pike are plentiful <fex>in Perrault Lake</fex>.
<fex>These days</fex> food is plentiful and easy to get and physical activity is no longer a part of daily life.
